name: Signature Spells
effects: choose two level 3 spells in your spellbook; you always have them prepared
you can cast each chosen spell once at level 3 without expending a spell slot
limits: after you cast a chosen spell this way, you cannot do so again until you finish a short or long rest
to cast either spell at a higher level, you must expend a spell slot
